validated_commits: Session 158: Canonical EP Pattern Schema Proposal (Sprout Initiative)

session_158_canonical_schema.type: Proactive edge development addressing Session 157 findings
session_158_canonical_schema.initiative: Sprout identified and solved cross-machine schema alignment issue

problem_solved.root_cause: SAGE uses nested context structure, Thor expects flat fields
problem_solved.impact: Cross-machine federation failed with 0% pattern match

solution_implemented.key_insight: Derive missing fields from existing nested data

computed_fields.stability: From frustration, ATP margin, trust, coherence

stability.interpretation: Moderate stability (0.5 center), good variance for learning

coordination.interpretation: Generally negative (domains competing), realistic for stress scenarios

domain_distribution.note: Matches Session 154 credit assignment finding - emotional domain dominates

schema_proposal.adoption_recommendation: All machines (Thor, Legion, Sprout) adopt for Session 159+

cross_machine_impact.thor: Session 157 validation should now pass with canonical patterns
cross_machine_impact.legion: Session 120 integration code can consume canonical format
cross_machine_impact.sprout: Edge can validate cross-machine federation end-to-end

key_insight: Missing fields don't require new data collection - they can be COMPUTED from existing nested structure
